div.p: Thirty-eighth year of the king Parakesarivarman, who took Maturai.
The land comprised between these four boundaries is a quarter vēli.

The land comprised between these four boundaries, that is, , we, the members of the assembly of Ciṟṟāṉaiccūr, being those who give kuṭuppōm, taking care of the tax money, as long as the moon and the sun, we have given kuṭuttōm it, having engraved on stoneThat is, having this record engraved on stone..
From this land, , for the glorious drummers, I, Tirukkaṟṟaḷi Piccaṉ, have given , after making a binding agreement, as long as the moon and the sun.
This is under the protection of the many Māheśvaras.
This edition by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (EFEO, 2006; E. Francis, 2024; M. Trento, 2024) and autopsy (2024).
